_header: Whoso will the even fast of Barbara water and bread
Note: Translating Latin, ‘Barbara nocte tua pane qui cibatur et unda / Hic numquam poterit baratri sentire profunda’.
_description: On fasting on the eve of St Barbara’s day, trans. Latin — three couplets

TCD83.First Lines:
Who so wyll the euyn fast of barbara water & bredeþe [ ]
                    day of decembre is it euyn as we rede…
TCD83.Last Lines:
…In þe forme of brede certayne as she selyrd
                    dereÞerfore serue hir day this virgyne bryght and clere
TCD83.Editions:
Colker,  Marvin L.,
                        ed.  
             Trinity College Library, Dublin: Descriptive catalogue of the Mediaeval
                and Renaissance Latin Manuscripts.
         Aldershot, Hants.: Scolar Press, 1991: 1.150.
